languages.text: Delivers devastating strike that can't be dodged or parried with it's paw to opponent and puts him Prone for 1 turn.

traits.locale_text: Delivers devastating strike that can't be dodged or parried with it's paw to opponent and puts him Prone for 1 turn.

languages.text: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо совершает разрушительный удар лапой, от которого нельзя защититься {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонением{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированием{/g}.{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}{/g} Цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинутой{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur führt einen {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}verheerenden{/g} Schlag mit ihrer Pranke aus, dem nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g} und der nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g} werden kann. Das Ziel wird 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur führt einen verheerenden Schlag mit ihrer Pranke aus, dem nicht ausgewichen und der nicht pariert werden kann. Das Ziel wird 1 Runde lang hingestreckt.

languages.text: Cette créature assène un coup de patte {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}dévastateur{/g} qui ne peut être ni {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivé{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}paré{/g}. La cible subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature assène un coup de patte dévastateur qui ne peut être ni esquivé ni paré. La cible subit l'effet Paralysie pendant 1 round.

languages.text: 对目标发动威力巨大的猛力爪击，使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此次爪击无法{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}{/g}
languages.original_text: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 对目标发动威力巨大的猛力爪击，使目标陷入倒地状态，持续一轮。此次爪击无法闪避或招架。

languages.text: Esta criatura asesta un zarpazo {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastador{/g} que no se puede {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parar{/g}. El objetivo queda {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura asesta un zarpazo devastador que no se puede esquivar ni parar. El objetivo queda derribado durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: この生物は爪で{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}不能な{g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}壊滅的な{/g}攻撃を行う。そのターゲットは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
languages.original_text: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は爪で回避または受け流し不能な壊滅的な攻撃を行う。そのターゲットは1ラウンドの間、脆弱化する。
この生物は爪で回避または受け流し不能な壊滅的な攻撃を行う。そのターゲットは1ラウンドの間、脆弱化する。

languages.text: Bu yaratık, pençesiyle {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}yıkıcı{/g} bir saldırı yapar. Bu saldırıya karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yapılamaz. Hedef {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilir{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: This creature delivers a {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}devastating{/g} strike with its paw that cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parried{/g}. The target is knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık, pençesiyle harap eden bir saldırı yapar. Bu saldırıya karşı kaçınma veya savuşturma yapılamaz. Hedef yere devrilir. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.

Bu yaratık, pençesiyle harap eden bir saldırı yapar. Bu saldırıya karşı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya savuşturma yapılamaz. Hedef yere devrilir. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
